verses.text: \w What|strong="H4100"\w* shalt thou \w see|strong="H2372"\w* \w in|strong="H7725"\w* \w the|strong="H7725"\w* Sulamitess \w but|strong="H4100"\w* \w the|strong="H7725"\w* \w companies|strong="H4264"\w* \w of|strong="H4264"\w* \w camps|strong="H4264"\w*? \w How|strong="H4100"\w* beautiful \w are|strong="H4100"\w* thy steps \w in|strong="H7725"\w* shoes, \w O|strong="H4100"\w* princeâ€™s daughter! \w The|strong="H7725"\w* joints \w of|strong="H4264"\w* thy thighs \w are|strong="H4100"\w* \w like|strong="H7725"\w* jewels, \w that|strong="H7725"\w* \w are|strong="H4100"\w* \w made|strong="H7725"\w* \w by|strong="H7725"\w* \w the|strong="H7725"\w* hand \w of|strong="H4264"\w* \w a|strong="H7725"\w* skillful workman.

Thy navel \w is|strong="H4100"\w* \w like|strong="H3644"\w* \w a|strong="H3644"\w* round bowl never wanting cups. Thy belly \w is|strong="H4100"\w* \w like|strong="H3644"\w* \w a|strong="H3644"\w* heap \w of|strong="H1323"\w* wheat, set about \w with|strong="H3027"\w* lilies.
Thy two breasts are \w like|strong="H7799"\w* two young roes that are twins.

Thy neck as a tower \w of|strong="H8147"\w* ivory. Thy eyes like \w the|strong="H8147"\w* fishpools \w in|strong="H8147"\w* Hesebon, which \w are|strong="H8147"\w* \w in|strong="H8147"\w* \w the|strong="H8147"\w* gate \w of|strong="H8147"\w* \w the|strong="H8147"\w* daughter \w of|strong="H8147"\w* \w the|strong="H8147"\w* multitude. Thy nose is as \w the|strong="H8147"\w* tower \w of|strong="H8147"\w* Libanus, that looketh toward Damascus.

Thy \w head|strong="H6440"\w* \w is|strong="H0639"\w* \w like|strong="H0639"\w* Carmel: \w and|strong="H5869"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* hairs \w of|strong="H5869"\w* thy \w head|strong="H6440"\w* \w as|strong="H8179"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* purple \w of|strong="H5869"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w king|strong="H5921"\w* bound \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* channels.
How beautiful art thou, \w and|strong="H4428"\w* how comely, \w my|strong="H5921"\w* dearest, \w in|strong="H5921"\w* delights!

Thy stature \w is|strong="H4100"\w* like \w to|strong="H4100"\w* \w a|strong="H4100"\w* palm tree, \w and|strong="H3302"\w* thy breasts \w to|strong="H4100"\w* clusters \w of|strong="H0160"\w* grapes.

\w I|strong="H1819"\w* said: \w I|strong="H1819"\w* will go up into \w the|strong="H1819"\w* \w palm|strong="H8558"\w* \w tree|strong="H8558"\w*, and will take hold \w of|strong="H6967"\w* \w the|strong="H1819"\w* fruit thereof: and thy \w breasts|strong="H7699"\w* shall be as \w the|strong="H1819"\w* \w clusters|strong="H0811"\w* \w of|strong="H6967"\w* \w the|strong="H1819"\w* vine: and \w the|strong="H1819"\w* odour \w of|strong="H6967"\w* thy mouth \w like|strong="H1819"\w* apples.

Thy throat \w like|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* best wine, worthy \w for|strong="H1961"\w* \w my|strong="H1961"\w* beloved \w to|strong="H0559"\w* drink, \w and|strong="H0639"\w* \w for|strong="H1961"\w* \w his|strong="H1961"\w* lips \w and|strong="H0639"\w* \w his|strong="H1961"\w* teeth \w to|strong="H0559"\w* ruminate.

I \w to|strong="H1980"\w* \w my|strong="H1980"\w* \w beloved|strong="H1730"\w*, \w and|strong="H1980"\w* \w his|strong="H1980"\w* \w turning|strong="H1980"\w* \w is|strong="H1730"\w* towards \w me|strong="H1980"\w*.

Come, \w my|strong="H5921"\w* \w beloved|strong="H1730"\w*, let \w us|strong="H5921"\w* go forth \w into|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* field, let \w us|strong="H5921"\w* abide \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* villages.

Let \w us|strong="H7704"\w* \w get|strong="H3318"\w* up early \w to|strong="H3318"\w* \w the|strong="H3318"\w* vineyards, let \w us|strong="H7704"\w* see if \w the|strong="H3318"\w* vineyard flourish, if \w the|strong="H3318"\w* flowers be ready \w to|strong="H3318"\w* \w bring|strong="H3318"\w* \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* fruits, if \w the|strong="H3318"\w* pomegranates flourish: there \w will|strong="H7704"\w* I give thee \w my|strong="H3318"\w* breasts.

\w The|strong="H0853"\w* mandrakes \w give|strong="H5414"\w* \w a|strong="H5414"\w* smell. \w In|strong="H8033"\w* \w our|strong="H5414"\w* gates \w are|strong="H8033"\w* all fruits: \w the|strong="H0853"\w* new \w and|strong="H8033"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* old, \w my|strong="H5414"\w* \w beloved|strong="H1730"\w*, \w I|strong="H0518"\w* \w have|strong="H0518"\w* \w kept|strong="H5414"\w* \w for|strong="H0518"\w* thee.
